verbs.description: [ARG0: arrest records] [V: show] [ARG1: no crime spike related to mgm springfield presence] downtown police say forty - three people were arrested and 26 issued criminal summonses on the grounds of mgm springfield during the casino first six weeks of operation the majority of the crimes were for minor offenses according to massachusetts state police spokesman david procopio springfield police superintendent state polices lt col barry o'brien lt timothy babbin massachusetts gaming commission drug possession mgm springfield metro goldwyn mayer police massachusetts state police crime arrest david procopio gaming enforcement unit springfield masslive assault mgm ryan walsh devon williams president michael mathis springfield massachusetts state police springfield police department
